## Installation

```{r,eval=FALSE}
# Install devtools if it is not yet installed
if(!require("devtools")){
  install.packages("devtools")
}

# Install senlinplot
if(!require("pleiosim")){
  devtools::install_github("Broccolito/pleiosim")
  library("pleiosim")
}
```

## Usage

Load the PleioSim package, set seed for the simulation
```{r,eval=FALSE}
library(pleiosim)
set.seed(492357816)
```
